note: Cannot purchase the Academics, Computer, or Science skills. ST may limit levels in Lore or Occult.
name: Illiterate

note: Must concentrate to continue using a power, w/o concentration the power ends in 1 turn. Permanent Willpower is reduced by 1.
name: Short Attention Span

note: Must have at least 3 dots of Vicissitude to use this merit. Cannot be purchased by Bloodline: Carpathian. Must choose either hellhound (animal) or szlachta (human) for each purchased Retainer. Add one item from List 9 to the Retainer.
name: Szlachta

note: Gain +2 to Brawl, Melee and Ranged attacks when attacking someone targeted by another Brujah.
name: Brotherhood

note: Gain the innate status of your gang, functions the same as the innate Moniker status.
name: Moniker

note: When delayed in action, must spend 1 Willpower to wait w/o acting for 5 minutes. If the spend isn't made the character will lash out at the source of the delay.
name: Impatient

note: Reduce mental test pools by 2 (including defensive) when in a challenge against a known Sabbat member.
name: Escaped Shovelhead
Blunted Fangs
note: Bite does not do aggravated damage and does not invoke the Kiss.
Must spend at least 10 minutes in the company of true corpses each night. If not, suffer a -1 penalty to all test pools until this is done. Penalty is not cumulative.
name: Necrophile

note: Immune to blood bonds and Vinculum. Cannot be taken by Tremere or any Tremere Bloodline.
name: Unbondable

note: Gain +2 to all ritae test pools as leader. Grant +2 on a lend as a participant.
name: Sanctified
The Forbidden Garden; of Those Things Which Are Not Spoken
Ambidextrous
note: Once per turn, you can use one the qualities from your main weapon and one from your off hand weapon to augment attack. Cannot be the same quality from both.

name: Hard of Hearing
note: Suffer -2 to Awareness and Investigation pools based on hearing.
Opens up List 4 as an out of Clan Discipline, can never have Thaumaturgy without this merit.
name: Thaumaturgic Training
Additional Common Discipline
note: Opens up List 1 for an additional Discipline slot.
Can use Entrancement by direct sound of voice alone.
name: Soaring Octaves
Ghostly Retainer
note: Gain a level 5 Retainer wraith. If character possesses Necromancy: Sepulchre Path, can instantly summon the retainer for 1 Blood.

Skin retains signs of damage even after it is healed. Each time the character suffers a Physical attack that does 2+ damage, suffers -1 penalty to Physical. Penalty cannot be healed, only goes away after full day of rest.
name: Flesh of the Corpse

note: Once per hour, use simple action to increase max Blood expenditure rate by 5 for 1 turn. Must loudly proclaim faith in Caine and his Dark Church.
name: Revelator

note: Once per game, can ask the ST for a clue about relevant plot. Once an hour, can sacrifice a standard action to perform a simple one even out of Initiative order.
name: Oracular Ability

note: Choose two special abilities from List 8.
name: Unnatural Adaptation

note: When someone satisfactorily repays the character a boon, can grant fleeting status of Gallant.
name: Social Nobility

note: Gain second Mental attribute focus.
name: Expanded Consciousness

note: Neonate is of the 12th Generation, Ancilla is of the 10th Generation. Flaw cannot be taken by any Elders.
name: Lesser Generation 1
Thaumaturgy: Engaging the Vessel of Transference
Walk the Abyss
note: Abyssal Mysticism, allows access to items that require it. Walk through the Abyss w/ up to 3 willing people. Test with ST to determine time to destination (no pool); win = 1hr, tie = 3 hours, loss = 6 hours. Suffer 1 agg per hour in the Abyss.
Appear alive and healthy. Can consume food and drink. Cannot be on a Path of Enlightenment.
name: Personal Masquerade
Eclipsed Blood
note: Stay awake and regain Willpower even if active in the day. Take unsoakable normal, rather than aggravated, damage from sunlight.

name: Dark Statue
note: Turns user into solid stone. Can perceive surroundings and heal. Immobile and cannot use Disciplines. Immune to sun and fire damage, and automatically resist sun triggered fear frenzy. Gain 3 health levels.

name: Conspicuous Consumption
note: Start the evening with a Beast trait and gain an additional Beast trait each time the character feeds. Can eat flesh as if had Personal Masquerade.
Cannot use standard Archetype retest unless has 3 point vinculum to at least 3 Sabbat. Must spend 2 Willpower on the first retest of each session.
name: Tenuous Loyalty
The Books of al-Az the Elder

note: Gain free retest against Auspex, Animalism, and Dominate. Can be used before or after the normal Willpower retest. Exception to rules limiting retests.
name: Iron Will

note: Opens up List 5 as an additional in Clan Discipline learnable w/o a teacher. Purchasable multiple times.
name: Necromantic Expertise

note: Cannot directly harm or effect with powers a mortal who formally presents a symbol of their faith, take 1 normal damage per turn in physical contact with a holy symbol, and if forced onto holy ground suffer 3 unsoakable agg per turn. Cannot be taken by Baali or Baali Bloodlines.
name: Repelled by Religion

note: Can spend 1 more Blood per turn than Generation allows.
name: Intense Vitality (Elder)
The Chronicle of the Lost Tribe
Permanent Wound
note: Unhealable wound, lose two Healthy wound levels.
Max fleeting Status is 1 less than normal.
name: Tainted Embrace

note: Take 2 steps per movement instead of 3.
name: Awkward Mobility

note: Cannot spend Willpower to retest Thaumaturgy, Necromancy or other forms of magic.
name: Magic Susceptibility
Rugged
note: An additional level in each wound rank.
Lose one level in both the Injured and Incapacitated wound ranks.
name: Low Pain Threshold

note: Gain the innate status Branded and +3 to resist Telepathy and other powers to directly pull information from your mind.
name: Black Hand Membership

note: Allows character to create art or performance that invokes a specific emotion. Viewers who wish to ignore or run counter to the emotion may spend 1 Willpower to ignore for an hour.
name: Absent Sway

note: Gain the innate status Purified, +3 to  resist all infernal powers and infernal merits, and +3 to Dodge based defensive pools against demons and character who possess infernal powers or merits.
name: Inquisition Membership
Artist's Blessing
note: Increases max level of all Craft and Performance skills by 2. Gain first 3 levels of 1 Craft or Performance skill for free.
Initiative is reduced by 5.
name: Slow Reactions
Righteous Fury
note: Gain +3 to Brawl and Melee pools when targeting characters who possesses demonic powers, infernal merits or investments, or Daimoinon. Gain +1 to Brawl and Melee pools when targeting diablerists or Tremere.
Stay awake 1 hour after sunrise and up 1 hour before sunset. Awaken instantly at signs of trouble or danger. Ignore penalties for acting in daytime.
name: Light Sleeper
Born in Shadow
note: Once per turn, activate 1 of the first 2 levels of Obtenebration or increase the radius of Shroud of Night w/o spending Blood, all other requirements must be met.
Assign 2 Lore specializations per dot of the Lore skill.
name: Loremaster
Angelic Visage
note: Gain Social attribute focus Charisma in addition to normal attribute focus. Gain alien beauty rather than a monstrous visage w/ low Humanity or Path.
You were Embraced prior to 1800
name: Old Dog
Thaumaturgy: Defense of the Sacred Haven
The Book of Going Forth by Night
Thaumaturgy: Illuminate the Trail of Prey

note: Unreasonable dislike of a Clan, Bloodline or type of person. Suffer -2 penalty to all non-combat pools if forced to work with such a person.
name: Intolerant

note: Can carry 1 more fleeting status than normal limit allows.
name: Reputation
Sorcerous Dabbler
note: Grants 3 level 1 or 2 level 2 Thaumaturgical Rituals, even if the character has no Thaumaturgy. Character must still spend normal XP for them, this just grants access.
Suffer -5 to Investigation & Awareness tests for the first hour of game and for an hour after feeding.
name: Addiction (Sedatives)

note: Cannot feed from (or gain sustenance from) a specific type of mortal. If other vampires are seen feeding from this group, character must attempt to stop them. Gains Beat trait if fails to stop them. Cannot be taken by Ventrue or Ventrue Bloodlines.
name: Prey Exclusion

note: Gain 5 free dots in Haven, Herd or Resources. Gain a temple that is considered holy ground. If the character spends 3 Blood and rests the day in the temple, heal 2 aggravated instead of 1.
name: Personal Cult

note: Increase maximum level of Performance by 3.
name: Supernatural Aria

note: Gain free retest against Necromancy, Thaumaturgy, Sabbat ritae and the powers of mages. Can be used before or after the normal Willpower retest. Exception to rules limiting retests. Can never learn Necromancy, Thaumaturgy or any other form of blood magic.
name: Magic Resistance

note: Radiate an otherworldly air, making people nervous. Can be taken up to 3 times for different aspects of character's strange nature, but each must be distinctive and unconnected from the rest.
name: Eerie Presence

note: Cannot spend Willpower to retest resisting Dominate and Dementation.
name: Weak-Willed

note: Cannot be targeted by powers that track at range (Clairvoyance, Illuminate the Trail of Prey, etc.). Line of sight powers still work.
name: Unseeing Eye

note: Radiate conspicuous evil. Devout mortals and hunters with True Faith recognize as a vampire. Any time character uses the 4th dot or higher of a Discipline, aura shows infernal taint. Cannot enter sacred sites. Powers of Faith (True Faith, Salubri) deal +1 point of damage.
name: Beacon of the Unholy

note: Opens up List 2 for an additional Discipline slot.
name: Additional Uncommon Discipline

note: Gain a +1 bonus to Brawl and Drive test pools and a +2 to defense test pools against formal title holders of the Camarilla and Sabbat.
name: Wild One

note: Cannot posses Lore skill above 2 and cannot possess Loremaster merit.
name: Sectarian

note: Register as mortal on all attempts to determine creature type, have unnaturally bright aura and animals can't sense Beast. Must have a Morality of at least 3 and cannot be on a Path of Enlightenment.
name: Whisper of Life

note: If character doesn't sleep on or under natural water, cannot spend Willpower the next night.
name: Poseidon's Call

note: Morality counts as -2 for purpose of staying awake in the day and determining daytime penalties.
name: Deep Sleeper
Escape Artist
note: Study surrounding for 3 turns to Fair Escape any physical restraints other than grapples. Cannot escape impossible situations with this.
Every time the character's Willpower decreases, they fall more into the waking visions. If all Willpower is lost the character falls into torpor.
name: Gehenna Prophet

note: Max fleeting Status is 1 less than normal.
name: Dubious Loyalties
Fragile Bones
note: If suffer 2+ damage from a single blow, 1 limb (chosen by attacker) is broken until the damage is healed. Leg/s= 1 step per movement. 1 arm w/ ambidexterity= -3 to Brawl and Melee pools. 1 arm w/o ambidexterity= -5 to Brawl and Melee pools. Both arms= cannot make Brawl or Melee attacks w/o bite or other power.
Character is boring and doesn't receive their Archetype retest.
name: Dull

note: Mortals and Ghouls cannot resist character's Dominate and Presence powers or techniques based off those powers.
name: Aura of Command

note: Considered as having -2 Beast Traits when resisting frenzy. Gain +3 to test pool to resist frenzy. Brujah cannot take this merit. Restriction does not apply to True Brujah.
name: Calm Heart

note: If real name, photo or other identifier gets out too often hunters may take an interest.
name: Known to be Dead

note: Opens up List 4 as an additional in Clan Discipline learnable w/o a teacher. Purchasable multiple times.
name: Thaumaturgical Expertise

note: Spend 1 Blood (if character has no Beast traits) to automatically resist demonic powers, infernal merits or investments, or Daimoinon. Can be used at any time, even before Initiative. Cannot learn demonic powers, purchase infernal merits, utilize infernal investments, or learn Daimoinon.
name: Spiritual Armor
Thaumaturgy: Stone of the True Form

note: Must spend an extra Blood point any time the character wishes to heal a point of damage. Only applies when character uses Blood to heal themselves, not to powers like Blood Rage.
name: Slow Healing

note: Bonus Status Trait Loyal.
name: Prestigious Sire

note: Rigid item between 5 inches and 6 feet long. Gain +2 to Thaumaturgy pools when touching it. Telyavic Tremere can build an Athame which has Concealable and Fast, Silver or Cold Iron weapon properties.
name: Talisman

note: Gain true flight at normal movement rates.
name: Flight
Soul Shard
note: Cannot spend Willpower while Incapacitated.
Every time character gains 1 or more Beast traits, character takes 1 unsoakable aggravated damage.
name: Bestial Instinct

note: Assign 1 additional ritae per dot of the Rituals background.
name: Scholar of the Sword

note: When target spends Willpower to resist your Awe or Majesty, they suffer 1 unsoakable Aggravated.
name: Scourge of Alecto
Dark Fate
note: If the character falls into torpor or is staked, they instead meet Final Death.
Cannot purchase the Computer, Drive, Science, or Security skills.
name: Archaic

note: When Injured, gain a +3 to Initiative. When Incapacitated, gain +3 more (cumulative +6) to Initiative.
name: Fanatic
Awakening the Steel
note: Spend 1 blood to summon your blade or reform it when broken.
Do not receive a focus in one chosen Attribute. Must be purchased at creation.
name: Stolen Potential

note: Suffer -1 to Mental tests involving coordination or mental dexterity for the first hour of game and for an hour after feeding.
name: Addiction (Amphetamine)

note: Starting Physical Attribute max of 5 instead of 10.
name: Childlike

note: Max fleeting Status is 1 less than normal.
name: Mistrusted
Necromancy: Call of the Hungry Dead

note: Silver does aggravated damage to the character rather than normal.
name: Vulnerable to Silver

note: Once per hour can activate a Protean power w/o the costs (blood or time). Cannot be used on Elder powers or Techniques. Can be used with Shape of the Beast's Wrath.
name: Protean Blood

note: No knowledge of character's past paramours, enemies or allies.
name: Amnesia

note: Do not invoke the Kiss, must grapple prey, cannot seal feeding wound, and feeding from mortals is a level 1 Morality sin.
name: Grip of the Damned

note: Allows non-sect character to hold 1 fleeting Camarilla status.
name: Emissary to the Camarilla

note: Whenever ST determines random negative result (falling rock, police patrol, etc.) no test is made. Character always suffers the bad luck.
name: Trouble Magnet

note: If you win a test to resist a mind control power (such as Dominate), you are immune to that user's mind control for the rest of the evening.
name: Dauntless
Machiavellian Prodigy
note: Treated as one social class higher.
Gain +3 to pools for extremely dangerous Physical tests. Gain +2 to defensive Physical pools when facing multiple opponents alone.
name: Daredevil

note: Gain +3 to Physical test pools when attacking from surprise.
name: Surprise Attack

note: One sense acts as if it were Heightened Senses. Do not have to spend Blood to use Heightened Senses with that sense.
name: Acute Sense
Pied Piper
note: Animals (specific type chosen when flaw is taken) flock to character, seeing through supernatural concealment.
Simple action to gain +2 wild card bonus to attack and if successful do aggravated damage with fists.
name: Burning Wrath
Moral Compass
note: Once per game per target, counsel a vampire who lost a degeneration test for 10 minutes and they can reattempt that lost test.

name: Notoriety
note: Do not receive passive bonuses from fleeting status.
Choose one item from List 10. Must be Humanity 5+ and have Lore 4+ w/ the Golconda Lore specialty.
name: Golconda Seeker
Thaumaturgy: Innocence of the Child's Heart

note: Each day spent w/o contact with 2 handfuls of home soil = -1 to all attack test pools (max -5). Cannot be taken by Tzimisce or any Tzimisce Bloodline.
name: Bound to the Earth

note: Build character as a Ghoul, except they gain 7 dots for their choice of Disciplines, cannot have more than 3 dots in any Discipline, aren't bound and cannot be Embraced.
name: Dhampir
Thaumaturgy: Eyes of the Night Hawk
The Diaries of Constantin Addams, Regent of the Sixth Circle
Crisis of Faith
note: When bad things happen, make a static test with ST. On lose or tie, count as unfaithful in ritae for 2 games or 1 month.
Minor curse that effects a Skill chosen when the flaw is taken. When triggered subtracts 1 from the chosen Skill.
name: Cursed
Infernal Heritage
note: Duplicates both Infernal Power and Path of Evil Revelations merits.
Gain access to Thaumaturgy: Path of Corruption and one item from List 4 without a teacher, must still pay out of Clan costs.
name: Setite Sorcery

note: Can spend 1 downtime to get word of hunter activity, and if wished feed those hunter false leads.
name: Ear to the Ground

note: Opens up List 2 for last Discipline slot
name: Vestiges of Greatness

note: If gain negative Anarch status, lose access to backgrounds.
name: Bastard Childe

note: When in ritae that fails, can make a static challenge (Mental+Occult vs. 6) to determine the number of participants who lacked faith.
name: Zealot

note: Free Lore specialization above what you are normally allowed in one of; Sabbat Doctrine, Quotes of Caine, or Cainite Heresy. Receive a +5 bonus on pools involving your bonus Lore specialization.
name: Keeper of a Sacred Text

note: Gain +3 to Dodge based test pools.
name: Slippery Customer

note: Gain +3 to test pools resisting Thaumaturgy. Use standard action and 1 blood to dispel magic on a person (Mental+Occult vs. target's Mental+Willpower). If successful all Thaum powers on the target end and items go defunct for an hour. Same action and Blood for an area (Mental+Occult vs. 12) to dispel all ritual within 5 steps.
name: Countermagic

note: Assign 2 Influence specializations per dot of Influence background.
name: Monopoly
Efficient Digestion
note: Animal Blood is not reduced by half. Mortal Blood is doubled. Herd effectiveness is doubled. Cannot exceed normal Blood pool maximum.
Assign 2 Language specializations per dot of Linguistics skill.
name: Natural Linguist

note: Gain 3 Blood any time a sentient being dies within character's line of sight. Cannot exceed normal Blood pool limits.
name: Pierced Shroud
Addiction (Hallucinogen)
note: Agitated and cannot regain Willpower for the first hour of game and for an hour after feeding.
If character fails to explore something new or unknown, maximum Willpower is reduced by 1 for the evening. This is cumulative, each such failure in the evening adds up.
name: Curiosity

note: Gain +2 bonus on Computers and Science test pools.
name: Tech Junkie

note: Once per combat, gain a Willpower when entering frenzy.
name: Volatile
Dark Secret
note: A secret from character's past that would cause great embarrassment if uncovered.

name: Untrained Combatant
note: Cannot perform combat maneuvers or gain benefit from combat maneuvers.
Gain +3 to attack pools (Physical, Social and Mental) when defending haven. Gain +2 dots of Lore skill and max increases by 2.
name: Blood of Tzimisce
Blase
note: Gain free retest against Dementation, Melpominee, and Presence. Can be used before or after the normal Willpower retest. Exception to rules limiting retests.

name: Waking Dream
note: Once per game session, utilize a simple chimerical illusion as if were real (stairs, knife, lever, etc.) for one full turn. Cannot be used to help or harm another character.
Calculate Blood pool as if has -1 Generation. Neonates reduce Blood pool by 2 Blood.
name: Weak Stomach

note: Once per game session, use any 1 Presence power without using an action and before character's Initiative. Normal costs and tests still apply.
name: Regal Bearing

note: Neonate is of the 13th Generation. Flaw cannot be taken by Elders.
name: Lesser Generation 2

note: Lose 1 downtime a month.
name: Black Sheep
Necromantic Insight
note: Opens up List 5 as an additional in Clan Discipline learnable w/o a teacher. Purchasable multiple times.
Effectively Phobia Derangement against individuals trying to blood bond or vaulderie you.
name: Once Enslaved

note: Can spend 1 more Blood per turn than Generation allows.
name: Intense Vitality

note: Choose one item from List 6.
name: Infernal Power

note: Recover from Beast traits at 1 per day of rest rather than all in 1 day of rest.
name: Nightmares

note: Expend a downtime to add Antique quality to an item of non-combat equipment. Does not count against the item's quality limit.
name: Antiquities

note: innate status trait Architect
name: Architect of the Tower
Addictive Blood
note: One taste of character's blood is addictive. Creature must spend 1 Willpower to resist drinking a second time for 10 minutes. Must resist in this way 4 times to break the addiction.

name: Executioner
note: Gain +1 to pools involving Intimidation and Streetwise.

name: Thaumaturgy: Pavis of the Foul Presence

note: Opens up List 7 as an additional in Clan Discipline.
name: Pliable Blood

note: Maximum in one skill is increased by 1. Purchasable multiple times.
name: Skill Aptitude

note: Once per combat, downgrade an opponent's exceptional success to a normal one.
name: Lucky
Forgiven Diablerie
note: Made enemies and many Elders want to see downfall.

name: Elder of the Revolution
note: Must purchase this merit to be able to purchase the 7th or 6th Generation.
Neonate is of the 14th or 15th Generation and always Caitiff.
name: Thin Blooded
Shape of the Beast's Wrath
note: Can opt to turn into half-wolf/half-man monster in Fight Form. Gain +5 to Brawl test pool and do aggravated damage with Brawl attacks. All defensive pools (Physical, Social and Mental) suffer -2 penalty.
Once a week, regain 1 spent influence action in an influence of character's choice.
name: Master of Puppets

note: Gain free defensive retest against Chimeristry, Mytherceria, and Obfuscate. Can be used before or after the normal Willpower retest. Exception to rules limiting retests.
name: Clear Sighted

note: Choose one in-clan Discipline, no free dot in it and it costs out of clan XP. This Flaw cannot be removed.
name: Inept

note: Suffer -2 to all interactions with mortals unaware of the supernatural. Cannot purchase the Contacts, Allies, or Influence backgrounds.
name: Obvious Predator

note: Cannot cross a moving body of water 3 feet or larger across w/o spending 1 Willpower. Willpower is not regained w/o rest for a full day.
name: Cannot Cross Running Water

note: Cannot benefit from the assist attacker or assist defender tactics, unless the other person is following the character's direct orders.
name: Overconfident
Thaumaturgy: Flesh of the Fiery Touch
Disease Carrier
note: Mortals fed from die, unless Stamina focused. Costs +1 downtime to feed safely. If the extra downtime isn't spent, gain a Beast trait. Feeding during game takes twice as long to do it safely. If the extra time isn't taken, gain a Beast trait. Cannot be taken by Bloodline: Lamia.
Opens up List 5 as an out of Clan Discipline, can never have Necromancy without this merit.
name: Necromantic Training

note: Must spend 2 downtime actions a month just to avoid the individuals who want character's Final Death. If character doesn't spend the actions, enters game w/ Healthy wound track full of aggravated damage.
name: Hunted
Accused of Heresy
note: Treated as one social class lower. Neonates gain the Greater Status Ban applied to Caitiff. (Max Fleeting 1)

name: Haunted
note: Vengeful ghost out to make character's eternity as uncomfortable as possible. Character can hear and see the ghost.
Suffer -2 to all Physical ranged attacks, including guns and thrown.
name: Bad Sight
Path of Power and the Inner Voice

note: Suffer -5 to all Physical ranged attacks, including guns and thrown.
name: One Eye

note: Duplicate any General merit worth up to 3 points.
name: Auspicious

note: Seek to corrupt, destroy or tarnish anything pure.
name: Thirst for Innocence
Death Sight
note: All Investigation pools suffer a -2 penalty, cannot use Aura Perception to determine creature type, and cannot visually differentiate between mortal and vampire.
Increases maximum permanent Willpower to 7.
name: Unyielding

note: Choose 1 attribute category (Physical, Social, Mental) and select an additional focus for that attribute.
name: Versatile
Karavalanisha Vrana/Wounds of the Night�s Sword

note: Auspex does not automatically notify users of Unseen Presence. Unseen Presence also works on the character in daysleep.
name: Hidden Advantage

note: Considered as having +1 Beast trait when determining frenzy. Cannot be taken by Brujah.
name: Short Fuse

note: Gain a natural ability to see and hear ghosts, and occasionally glimpse the surrounding Shadowlands.
name: Medium

note: Instructor for a Discipline is not required to spend a Willpower to teach. Downtimes are not required to learn.
name: Efficient Learner

note: Every time character spends Blood, character takes 1 unsoakable normal damage.
name: Blood Rot
Sophistry
note: Once per game session, spend 1 Blood to auto-win or completely avoid a Physical, Social or Mental test that could result in injury.

Character's attacks don't count against another's ability to declare fair escape, unless they are in a grapple. Anyone the character attacks prior to their initiative in the round may still declare fair escape in that round. If someone declares the intention of fair escape, character cannot declare a Physical action to prevent fair escape.
name: Careless

note: Enters game with half Blood pool, no amount of downtimes can increase this. May feed to full only on other Vampires and cannot benefit from Herd.
name: Methuselah's Thirst
Dancer's Grace
note: Once per turn, gain free retest on Physical + Dodge pools. Can be used before or after the normal Willpower retest. Exception to rules limiting retests. Can be used in Celerity rounds, but only once per turn.

name: Thaumaturgy: Principal Focus of Vitae Infusion
Path of Death and the Soul
Code of Honor
note: Once per hour, gain a +2 wild card bonus to resist Social or Mental power use with the intent to force character to violate Personal Code of Ethics.
Everyone sees character's Beast in mirrors. Character gains a Beast trait each time they look in a mirror. Does not count towards Morality loss, but does count towards frenzy.
name: Beast in the Mirror
Paragon
note: Resources money x 2, +1 action per Influence controlled (Elite or Underworld), gain Retainer 6 (NPC Neonate Ventrue - choose 3 items from Haven, Herd, Influence (Elite or Underworld) or Resources; 3 dots in 1, 2 dots in other, 1 dot in last)

name: Labyrinthine Mind
note: Gain +3 to test pools resisting Dementation, Dominate, and Thaumaturgy: Path of Corruption. Anyone attempting to pull information from your mind gains 1 of your derangements for an hour.
People forget character, paper trails disappear and computer files are randomly lost.
name: Arcane

note: All Anarchs within 10 steps of you in a Call to Arms gain a +2 wild card bonus to either their Brawl or Melees skill.
name: Lion of the Cause

note: Any officer of character's sect can spend any status trait (abiding, innate, fleeting) to give character the Warned status trait.
name: Infamous Brood

note: Can learn Celerity and Fortitude w/o a teacher. Must still pay out of Clan costs.
name: Mook
